title: Quitting due to placement
body:
I thought this was supposed to be a "soft reset" as the new season ticked over I was in Silver 5 division playing in promos to silver 4 in which I had lost one game and won one game. I had decent mmr as I earned roughly 20 lp per win and lost 12-14 for a loss.

After going 6 wins 4 losses in my placement I am now bronze 3 wtf?

This is how my performances looked, not the greatest but far from the worst how can it make me drop 3-4 divisions.

and before anyone says oh youll climb out of bronze easily, yes I have the skill to do it, but it will take loads of games cause of all the toxic, troll, afks and feeders in the depths of hell in bronze 3.

Game 1: 13/7/6  loss
game 2: 8/8/16 loss
game 3: 11/8/17 loss
game 4: 11/6/7 win
game 5: 10/6/7 win
game 6: 3/3/4 win
game 7: 5/10/20 loss
game 8: 1/2/3 win
game 9: 11/4/6 win
game 10: 9/7/19 win

WTF? none of those games are too bad and all of them have positive kda's

replies.body: By the looks of it you couldn't handle games against opponents of your skill level and slightly below so you ended up being placed where you belong.
if that was the case wouldn't I lose more lp than gain whilst I was playing?

you get put where your MMR sees fit bud, whether it be the mmr is higher or lower for bronze you got put there,2 seasons ago i ended silver 2 because i rage quit half way through due to oce server being the worst server iv ever seen when it comes to abuse and trolling, i came back for the next season (which  was last season) and i won 10-0 with my provisional, i got put to plat 2
how f**kin stoked was i, i later climbed to diamond and then got taken out of it from decay, but anywho the point is if you deserve silver 5 you will get there, keep your mouth shut in game and let your plays do the talking, do not talk to your bronze mates, it is more distracting to you than you think and 9/10 times you will end in argument
bronze is truly the scum of league, 90% of the players in brozne are toxic pieces of garbage and deserve a ban, the other 10% are just unlucky players who dont know how to not reply to those people before they start trolling.
i feel your pain buddy, play your best and be friendly/quiet and youll be out of bronze in no time :)

I really doubt you have the skill to do it,  you are on of those people which won't admit that they're bad and also play a small amount of ranked because they know that their "noob feeder allies" will get them demoted.
  
If you weren't awful at this game you would man up and play ranked regardless of demotion, and analyse yourself, you might eventually make gold.

Stop thinking you are entitled to silver elos, which imo is really really bad, just as bad as bronze nearly.

Your silver 5 buddies are like
"fukn just had a %%%%%%ed vayne 1v5 such trash cant climb from dis cesspool of dweebs"
"Oh mayn all dem bronzies r so crap we belong silver cauz we better"

Searching for a normal game:

You when you get demoted bronze
"noooo dey tink i suk now, oh wellz shud prob quit cauz I just KNOW dat dem feeder blitz shen malphite will keep me loked in"
"I r gona make a rage post on forum cauz i am so much bettter den bronze liek wtf lel"
One more player thinking they deserve better out the game, once you let your ego deflate a bit you are welcome back anytime! ;)

whats wrong with thinking you deserve better?
its actually very healthy to aim higher than you are given, reasonably higher that is
have you never set a goal before?

Healthy to *aim* higher, but not with the sense of entitlement. 
To reach goals you must evaluate your current situation and work on improvement instead of giving up because you 'deserve' better.
First few games .matters most as it narrows the range

i think im safe
Your MMR was obviously not that good then. :/

Silver 5, went 5-5, got Bronze 3.

I know Silver 5's that went 8-2 and got Bronze 4. Be happy. If you are good enough you will leave Bronze easily.

Soft reset means your MMR was 1-2 Divisions lower than where you ended the season. 
I heard that the biggest MMR gain/loss is in the first three placements, which you lost (it works that way with new players, not sure if the same applies here though.)
You said yourself that you had the skill to climb back to silver, go for it.
inb4 Silver 5 scrubs be like "IM NOT BRONZE".

all these comments....all %%%%%%ed and rude.

1: KDA means nothing.
2: 6-4 isnt bad, no idea why people are thinking it is.
3: what were you last season at the end? riot changed it so its based on that, preseason means very very little now, and those 10 games mean even less.
4: losing the first 3 games in a row is possibly the worst part. since in previous seasons those first few games are worth the most, getting you to a spot quickly and then the remaining games decide if you stay there or go up or down from there. so i assume you were put to about 1100-1150, silver 5 MMR, and then lost 3 in a row causing you to drop to bronze 2-3, and then winning 5-1 wasnt enough to bring you higher.
or the more likely, you were low bronze end of season and got placed accordingly with an average win/loss in placements.
placements put you up vs people in silver 4 you lost, you lost vs silver 5, you lost vs bronze 1,2 then you get put where YOU BELONG!
Even though you were silver 4 you had terrible MMR most likely #Shrekt
